entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Running android tests fails with xharness output "Unknown arguments: Debug" #62161
  • System.Text.Json and docker image with unicode encoder issue #62152
  • FileLoadException thrown while loading the assembly name #62159
  • Document and/or change the relation between PGO and AggressiveOptimization #62148
  • AccessViolationException with PublishSingleFile #62145
  • Inter-process Mutex doesn't work for processes of different architectures on Apple Silicon #62140
    7.0.0
  • Is 'sb.AppendFormat($"{Signature.ParameterTypes[i]}");' a typo error #62137
  • HttpClient behavior difference between .Net 6 and .Net 5 #62136
  • [API Proposal]: DbDataReader.GetDateOnly and DbDataReader.GetTimeOnly #62135
  • Slow first HTTP POST request #62129
  • [mono] call GC.Collect(); block the main thread won't resume #62128
  • [WASM] System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests - Specified cast is not valid. #62125
    .NET 7.0
  • Debugger - Blazor WASM: Uncaught pause_on_uncaught (anonymous) @ VM324:1 #62146
  • Reconcile naming: GeneratedDllImportAttribute vs. RegexGeneratorAttribute #62123
  • ConcurrentStack.PushRange(T[]) throws an ArgumentOutOfRangeException on empty T[] #62121
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.FileSystem.Tests.DriveInfoWindowsTests.TestGetDrives #62119
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\debugging\\debuginfo\\tester\\tester.cmd #62118
  • Test failure: JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/Arm/ArmBase/Yield_r* on Arm64 #62117
    .NET 7.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `charsRequired` out parameter to `TryParse` methods #62115

Closed

  • How #62144
  • Enabling AOT on a project referencing Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Table fails compilation #62089
  • SocketsHttpHandler: Support zero-byte read on response streams #61475
    7.0.0
  • APIs for exporting certificates and keys to PEM #51630
    7.0.0
  • Extremly slow build & size explosion of assembly when compiling for WASM in AOT mode #61139
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests JitMinOpts only timeout #10680
    Future
  • TimeZoneNotFoundException: The time zone ID 'America/Chicago' was not found on the local computer. #60175
    Future
  • [Question] how to return stack allocated bytes without putting it in the heap? #62127
  • Assert: src/mono/mono/metadata/class-setup-vtable.c:1747, condition `<disabled>' not met #61603
  • [wasm] JS Interop tests failing with latest chrome - `JavaScript host object 'SharedArrayBuffer' not found` #61945
  • [API Proposal]: Return implementation for IEnumerable<T> #62097
  • Please add a method to C# standard library to send deleted files to recycle bin #62114
  • Request for hardware based rng, and integration with vector struct. #62110

PullRequests

Created

  • Track a missing place to reset alignment flag from BasicBlock #62163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run Codespaces prebuild only in upstream repo #62162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use interpolated strings in place of `StringBuilder.AppendFormat` where possible. #62160
    community-contribution
  • Ensure all types are loaded when methods are accessed as function pointers #62158
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Adding support for the X86Base.Pause intrinsic on Mono (#61707)" #62157
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Remove workarounds for referencing the DllImport source generator now that we use the RTM sdk. #62156
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix calling NLS with Cultures has alternative sort names #62155
    area-System.Globalization
  • Remove extraneous support in the test runner generator for referencing corelib directly. #62154
  • Console.Unix: fix OpenStandardInput Stream sometimes throwing for Reads. #62153
    area-System.Console
  • Fix method HttpHeadersNonValidated uses to get HeaderDescriptor #62150
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix use of StringBuilder.AppendFormat in ILCompiler #62147
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [wasm] CI test of problems caused by not compiling event pipe on wasm. #62143
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement Runtime.evaluate. #62142
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Issue #61971 - Fix a bug causing EventCounter to fire twice on linux #62139
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: don't resolve DT_LNK/DT_UNKNOWN unless it is needed. #62138
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • don't run the System.IO.FileSystem.DriveInfo tests in parallel #62134
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • use TestDisableParallelization property to disable parallel test execution #62133
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • avoid code duplication for disabling parallelization with xUnit #62132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete support for TLS RVA statics from the Jit #62131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62130
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • No-op ConcurrentStack.PushRange(T[]) if empty #62126
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Allow runtimeconfig StartupHooks and Environment StartupHooks to both be present #62124
    area-Host
  • Add missing PTEST docs #62122
    community-contribution
  • Fix mono alc from gchandle #62120
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] CI test of problems caused by not linking full eventPipe on wasm. #62116
    NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Support zero-byte reads on HTTP response streams #61913
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup some code using ECAlgorithm #61943
    area-System.Security
  • Implement PEM exports for RSA PKCS#1 and ECPrivateKey #61946
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [wasm] Use cross origin policy headers #62016
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix `optComputeLoopSideEffects` to account for HWI stores #61911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 - Second attempt #60054
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update hash of the new CSE when resizing #61984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono]mono_runtime_delegate_invoke change to gc unsafe state #62003
    community-contribution

Updated

  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.DirectoryServices #61975
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 4 #61986
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Handle when DestroyStructure API passes null to the IL marshaller #62002
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.0 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support unloadability in `DispatchProxy`. #62095
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, needs-maintainer-attention
  • Dispose LdapConnections used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials #62036
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, needs-maintainer-attention
  • Updating and fixing unit tests for DirectoryServices.AccountManagement #56670
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, needs-maintainer-attention, 7.0.0
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, needs-maintainer-attention, 7.0.0
  • throw exception when creating an entry name that already exists in ZipArchive #60973
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, .NET 7.0
  • Always use int3/bkpt/brk for align that falls after jump #62106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Force new label after IG that ends with align instruction #62025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fixed ILVerify incorrectly flagging valid default interface implementations #61185
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, needs more info, community-contribution, needs-maintainer-attention
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #61631
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, needs-author-action
  • Add parser tests from nim-regex #62093
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, needs-author-action
  • Convert TryGetRawMetadata comment to XML documentation #61515
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, needs-maintainer-attention
  • Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62020
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • Make sanitizers work again in coreclr #61948
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Avoid printing debug info on 0 byte instructions #62077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a few syntax issues in shell scripts #62102
    area-Infrastructure
  • Mono hot reload reorg and beginning (disabled) add method support #61853
    area-EnC-mono
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix XmlSchema does not correctly validate xs:NMTOKENS type restrictions with enumeration #60544
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix StackTrace from a dim and Vtable offsets for static interface method #60770
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Don't merge CI test only] #61970
    * NO MERGE *
  • Type memory maps with placeholders #61933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable runtime tests to run on Android arm32 #51642
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add path information to INotifyInstanceUserLimitExceeded #62096
    area-System.IO
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean up symlink tests #62087
    area-System.IO
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP] Scavange fix #62008
    area-System.Net.Http

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Formatter should be configurable for a space before and after curly braces in interpolated string #58015
  • Move Type to .cs file fails #58014
  • Extract method of part of static local method creates non static method causing compile error #58013
  • Consider excluding specific methods from flow analysis rather than all implicitly declared void methods #58012
  • Improve diagnostic when using equality operators for relational patterns #58010
  • Source Generators: Intellisense is sluggish #58008
  • Broken double-checked locking (data race) in RazorDocumentServiceProviderWrapper #58004
  • VS2022 Release: Blazor doesn't show the helpers automatically in many occasions when underlined code from warnings #58002
  • Compiler is not picking up the extension method defined. #58001

Closed

  • Parameterless struct initialization re-uses values #57870
    17.1
  • Update the default language version for Visual Basic/VB to 16.9 #57093
    17.1
  • Crash while editing Syntax.xml #57987
  • CSharpScript with Single File .NET6 not working #57947

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Roslyn.VisualStudio.Setup as a build dependency for integration tests #58018
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pass AnalysisKind instead of int #58017
    Area-Analyzers
  • Update to DiffPlex 1.5.0 #58016
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix branch URLs in Language Feature Status #58011
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Hold Receiver directly in bound node for implicit indexer access #58009
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add feature to convert to file-scoped namespace just by typing `;` after a normal namespace. #58003
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Require definite assignment of all fields if struct includes any field initializers #57925
    Area-Compilers, 17.1.P2
  • Move Default VB Version to 16.9 #57688
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Simplify creation of interpolation text tokens. #57988
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Ensure we cache the previous item when two items are considered equal #57888
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Share '$' logic with the normal lexer and the interpolated string scanner. #57951
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • Attempt to mark EqualityContract property accessor as not auto-implemented #57917
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Do less work during CI checkout #57960
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify 'interpolation' data, and move to an easier to consume System.Range approach for it #57966
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Share '@'-sign logic with the normal lexer and the interpolated string scanner. #57946
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline Hints: VB fix parameter to match colon equal syntax #57712
    Area-IDE
  • Exclude unnecessary sqlite assemblies for .Net 6 host #57977
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Change nullable annotation on CopyAnnotationsTo() #57992
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate ref readonly with HPACK and QPACK helper methods #38705
  • Blazor WASM - AOT compilation - RuntimeError: null function or function signature #38703
  • Problem using Microsoft.AspNetCore.ClientAssets with spaces in outputpath #38702
  • JsonSerializerOptions constructor is not copying the context #38701
  • Perf regression: endpoint #38700
  • Connections.Abstractions broken with non-6.0 ASP.NETCore Apps #38699
  • Blazor Wasm: Guidance on updating integrity digest of blazor.boot.json after renaming .dll files #38691
  • StaticWebAssetBasePath not taken into account with JavaScript module initalizer #38690
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Clarification on AuthenticateResult.NoResult vs AuthenticateResult.Failure #38685
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #38682

Closed

  • HTTP/3: Validate headers successfully parsed to end #38643
    7.0-preview1
  • Assembly "foo.dll" does not contain an entrypoint #14370
    Next sprint planning
  • Measure and understand how time is spent currently in each phase / area of the build #27271
    Next sprint planning
  • MapControllers has no effect? #38672
  • .NET 6 WPF DI How to get an instance of IHubContext manually #38516
  • How to use IFormFile in .Net 6 #38562
  • Blazor does not free up memory #37066
    Discussions
  • Question Blazor: Guidance for component libs #37130
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #38676
  • Perf regression: mvc #38683
  • How to detect whether IJSRuntime is initialized? #38664
  • EEFileLoadException when executing Services.AddMvc after upgrading from NET5.0 to NET6.0 #38469
  • The issue 38654 has not been resolved #38697
  • Issues within Visual Studio when selecting both Azure AD and Docker Linux support #24151
    Next sprint planning
  • BUG: <PageTitle> not works in WasmPrerender mode #38192
    7.0-preview1
  • Potential solution for #33546 #38678
  • Blazor InputImage Component #38679
  • Ability to read page title in a .razor file (e.g. `layout.razor`) #38686
  • [.NET 6 WebAssembly] What i can use to encrypt/decrypt ? #38695
  • Repo #38694
  • Add Compile Time pre processor for WASM #38667
  • StaticWebAssets.xml missing #38522
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #38677

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove razor-compiler from aspnetcore #38706
    area-razor.compiler
  • Fix `components-e2e` Pipeline #38704
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/3: Improve static table compression to include values #38681
    area-runtime

Merged

  • HTTP/3: Unit tests for QPACK and validate end #38670
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Support Quarantined Tests in the `Components-E2E` Pipeline & Quarantine CanAddAndDisposeRootComponents #38693
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix grammar in XML docs #38661
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `c9c37ef` to `fc3ec49` #38687
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • typo fix: it's #38696
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3e0e32b` to `e2f3978` #38688
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • <see cref="DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware"/> #38659
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove a superfluous cache in `RouteValueDictionary`. #38660
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On iOS: SVG's load a lot bigger than they should in Tab Bar. #3579

Closed

Created

Merged

  • Fix Modal Appearing/Disappearing #3535
    6.0.200-preview.11

Updated

    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391

  • Button Padding #3575

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex') #26852
  • How to configure own entity with abstract owned entity? #26851
  • Why EF is disponsing Context and Closing/Opening new connections in a Single Command #26850
  • Cosmos Where query on owned properties throws a translation exception #26849
  • The instance of entity type 'Unit' cannot be tracked because another instance with the same key value for {'IdUnidade' } is already being tracked. #26848
  • Db.db-shm and db.db-wal cannot be cleaned up automatically #26845
  • FromSqlRaw_queryable_simple_projection_composed is missing NormalizeDelimitersInRawString on the 2nd string #26843
  • Casting in Bad_data_error_handling_invalid_cast test #26842
  • Executing .Contains on a static collection #26841
  • `EnableNullChecks` is cached unexpectedly? #26840

Closed

  • GROUP BY and string CONCAT #26838

PullRequests

Created

  • Added missing NormalizeDelimitersInRawString. #26844

Updated

  • Automatic refactorings based on static analysis of EFCore project #26806
  • Adding support for owned types mapped to same table as well as different tables #26706
  • Log warning when credentials used for reverse enigineering does not have view definition rights #26776

entry.title: dotnet/Comet - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Updated StateClassWrapper with fixes, a little rough in places but currently working. #202
